data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The script is called as usual and runs all included commands. A ____ script ____ contain ____ program ____ also ____ different ____. Each ____ call ____ have ____ options ____, ____ can ____ the ____ variables. If there are no further details the in the beginning of the script specified options apply.
data.partBlankContent: The script is called as usual and runs all included commands. A j__ script c__ contain sev____ program ca___ also fr__ different prog____. Each pro____ call c__ have redu_____ options atta____, wh___ can over____ the envir______ variables. If there are no further details the in the beginning of the script specified options apply.
data.fullContent: The script is called as usual and runs all included commands. A job script can contain several program calls also from different programs. Each program call can have redundant options attached, which can override the environment variables. If there are no further details the in the beginning of the script specified options apply.
data.answer: 像往常一样调用脚本并运行包含的所有命令。一个任务脚本可以包含来自不同程序的多个程序调用。每个程序调用都可以附加冗余选项，这些选项可以覆盖环境变量。如果没有进一步的详细信息，则应用脚本开头指定的选项。
